commenter.name: stayhealthybot
commenter.bio: I am a Twitch Bot developed by Aetaric and Simon to provide helpful tips and reminders on staying healthy while streaming and watching on Twitch!

message.body: Hey @twitchtriestoplay, you've been live for 31 hour(s)! Have you been drinking your water? It might also be a good time to get up and stretch, refill your water, grab something to eat, or maybe take a bathroom break! Stay Healthy!

message.body: We have a Discord server and there is currently a poll up for which game to be played after this (In 140day 10hour 14min 59sec 845msec (2023-09-10T00:00:00.000Z)), the options are: Final Fantasy (NES), Final Fantasy 4 (Super NES, known as Final Fantasy 2 in North America, not to be confused with Final Fantasy 2 NES) and Final Fantasy 6 (Super NES, known as Final Fantasy 3 in North America), you can vote for more than one option, Discord server link here: https://discord.gg/yHETNuZCUK
